Ill be vistied in this bank yesterday to get my new account open in this organization but when I get to the employees to asked them to me get my account and then the one said and give me the excuse that our some employees are on holidays so you came tomorrow or another dayy..  And i also visited another day near about 1:45 pm and they agian make an excuse that this is our lunch time. So i ll be waiting for next 1 hour to get into bank. But at the end they all said that after 3 pm we have not permission to open accounts
Helpful and supportive staff.Resolve all your queries..
Guard is doing work with partiality
